page.title: 20RELIGION - GLOUCESTER
page.content: THE SCHOOLS COMPILING THIS BLOCK ARE HEMPSTED VILLAGE AND ST.PAUL IN NEW STR. BOTH C.OF E. AND ST.PETER'S R.C. HORTON RD. IN 1979 THE CATHEDRAL CELEBRATED ITS 13TH CENTURY BIRTHDAY. OUT OF 22 C.OFE. CHURCHES ONLY ST.NICHOLAS IS REDUNDANT.THE DOCKS MARINERS CHURCH WAS REFURBISHED AND REOPENED THIS YEAR. A UKRANIAN CHURCH OPENED RECENTLY IN DERBY RD. A SECOND MOSQUE IS BEING COMPLETED THIS YEAR FOR THE GROWING MOSLEM POPULATION,MAINLY INDIANS. THE SALVATION ARMY HAS A NEW CITADEL NEAR THE LEISURE CENTRE. ROBERT RAIKES BIG CONTRIBUTION TO SUNDAY SCHOOLS WAS REMEMBERED LAST YEAR. THE VIA SACRA HAS BEEN REMARKED AND BLACKFRIARS RESTORED AND OPENED AFTER 400 YRS. GREYFRIARS RUIN IS PARTLY A LIBRARY. SOME CHAPELS HAVE COMBINED AS A REFORMED CHURCH.
